content.question: Great Hall of the Bulls in Lascaux, France, is similar to the rock painting of the running horned woman in Tassili n'Ajjer, Algeria, for which of the following reasons?

choices.label: Both works were created with mineral pigments.
Both works are situated on rocky cliff faces.
Both works feature scenes of everyday life.

content.answer: Both works were created with mineral pigments.

topic.text: 1.2: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Prehistoric Art

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe similarities and/or differences in two or more works of art using appropriate and relevant points of comparison.
